SELECT A.USER_ID , B.USER_NAME , FN_DEPT_NAME(A.DEPT_CODE) USER_DEPT_NAME , A.EVENT , FN_TO_CHAR(A.ACT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACT_DATE , A.IP FROM USER_ACT_LOG A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_USER_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE 1=1
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' + #{userName} + '%'
AND A.ACT_YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{startYmd},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{endYmd},'-','')
AND A.EVENT LIKE '%' + #{event} + '%'
AND A.CMGRP_CD = #{cmgrpCd}
ORDER BY A.ACT_DATE DESC

SELECT A.USER_ID , A.USER_NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , A.DEPT_NAME FROM USER_INFO A
WHERE A.USER_NAME LIKE '%' + #{userName} + '%'
AND A.CMGRP_CD = #{cmgrpCd}
ORDER BY A.USER_ID
